missedSessions.subject: %{name} your course "%{courseTitle}"
missedSessions.html:
Life get busy sometimes and it’s hard to keep up. Visualizing your goal can be a great help. Think of %{completionDate}, you wake up, and you realize what you just accomplished. A new skillset, plenty of new opportunities, the ability to work for yourself or create your dream startup. You did the hardest thing %{name}, you dared to start. Most people don’t even try. Keep it up, you got this :)

Remember, struggling means learning.

Resume course

Feeling down or lack motivation? Tell us more.

Mach10 team
%{url}
